Articles.Content:
If you go to the forum page for the Pirated Weapons, on the last page, people were complaining that they wanted a update for the download link. Here is a download link for Pirated Weapons on Curse! CLICK HERE TO DOWNLOAD.

Edited September 12, 2014 by CDK
For a banned website
Yep, that's a banned website. They basically copied the spaceport website without permission. You can't post those links here, they get autoremoved.

It's on my other tab right now, sorry! I will never post any Kerbal Space Parts (Kerbal Space Mods) again.

Apology comment for a banned website
I edited the post, now it's Curse.
